statements: UPDATE LocalDishes SET dish_name='Tacos', region='Mexico', main_ingredients='Tortilla, Meat, Cheese', cooking_method='Grilling' WHERE dish_id=1
UPDATE LocalDishes SET main_ingredients='Rice, Beans, Tortilla', historical_significance='Traditional dish in Latin America', region='Various countries' WHERE dish_id=2
UPDATE LocalDishes SET main_ingredients = 'Rice, Beans, Plantains' WHERE dish_id = 1;
UPDATE LocalDishes SET cooking_method = 'Grilled, Steamed' , historical_significance = 'Traditional dish in the region' WHERE dish_name = 'Moqueca'
UPDATE local_dishes SET dish_name='Pasta Carbonara', dish_origin='Italy', dish_ingredients=['pasta', 'eggs', 'pancetta', 'cheese'], dish_description='Classic Italian pasta dish' WHERE dish_id=1;
UPDATE cooking_methods SET method_duration=60, method_description='Boiling pasta in salted water until al dente', method_tools=['pot', 'stove'], method_name='Boiling' WHERE method_id=1;
UPDATE local_dishes SET dish_origin = 'Italy', dish_description = 'Delicious pasta dish with cheese and tomatoes' WHERE dish_id = 1;
UPDATE cooking_methods SET method_name = 'Grilling', method_duration = 60, method_description = 'Cooking method involving direct heat' WHERE method_id = 3;
UPDATE local_dishes SET dish_name='Biryani', region='South Asia' WHERE dish_id=1;
UPDATE cooking_methods SET description='A method of cooking food by steaming it in an underground pit' WHERE method_id=3;
UPDATE local_dishes SET region='Italian' WHERE dish_id=1;
UPDATE cooking_methods SET description='Slow cooking method' WHERE method_id=2;
UPDATE local_dishes SET ingredients = 'local produce, spices' WHERE dish_id = 'f6e14b37-7123-4d8c-90ca-6a0ddb1156cf';
UPDATE dish_history SET historical_details = 'Recipe updated for better taste' , historical_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE dish_id = '17de50cc-2b6d-4722-9c6b-019b8670c26b';
UPDATE local_dishes SET ingredients = 'Pasta, Tomato Sauce, Cheese' WHERE dish_id = 'a1b2c3';
UPDATE dish_reviews SET rating = 4.5, review_text = 'Delicious dish, highly recommend!' WHERE review_id = 'x4y7z2';
UPDATE LocalDishes SET region = 'Mediterranean', origin_year = 1995 WHERE dish_id = 1;
UPDATE Ingredients SET category = 'Spices' WHERE ingredient_id = 3;
UPDATE LocalDishes SET traditional_cooking_method = 'Grilled' WHERE dish_id = 1
UPDATE Ingredients SET category = 'Spices' WHERE ingredient_name = 'Cumin'
